import React from 'react'; import logo1 from '../images/logo1.png'; import * as Utils from '../utils/Utils'; import { default as ReactSelect } from "react-select"; import Option from "./Option" const image_text = "Add Image with size <= 500 KB" const cityOptions = [ { value: "LAGOS", label: "Lagos" }, { value: "ACCRA", label: "Accra" } ]; export default function AddEditDrink(props){ return
{image_text}



{Utils.getAmount(props.profit_price)}

}
